title: Claim a Whitefurze planter bundle for just £19.99!
content:

With this offer, you’ll receive two 38cm round bell planters and one 50cm bell trough in either terracotta or black, plus a 50-litre bag of J.Arthur Bower’s Multi-Purpose Compost for just £19.99, plus £2.95 for standard delivery or £4.50 for fast delivery.

Ready to take advantage of this great Whitefurze deal? Here’s what’s included in the bundle – all you need to do is choose between terracotta or black:

  • 2 x Whitefurze Round Bell Planters, 38cm
  • 1 x Whitefurze Bell Trough, 50cm

J.Arthur Bower’s Multi-Purpose Compost can help you achieve healthy, abundant growth and beautiful results. It’s a very versatile compost that can be used for virtually all types of plants, and the slightly coarse texture is perfect for all your potting needs, as it promotes healthy root growth and resists compaction. It’s suitable for: sowing seeds, taking cuttings, potting, re-potting, planting, containers and hanging baskets.
